mapper.sql: id, ship_id, person_id, phone_ip, nation, id_number, birth_place, duty, certificate_id, political
mapper.select:
select p.id,u.name as personName, p.person_id from ship_person p LEFT JOIN sys_user u on p.person_id = u.id LEFT JOIN ship_info_ship s on p.ship_id = s.id where p.delete_flag = 1
and p.id = #{id}

-- select p.*,u.*,u.name as personName,d.simple_name select p.id,p.certificate_id,u.name as personName from ship_person p LEFT JOIN sys_user u on p.person_id = u.id LEFT JOIN sys_dept d on u.dept_id = d.id -- LEFT JOIN ship_info_ship s on p.ship_id = s.id where p.delete_flag = 1 and d.simple_name like '%执法部%'

select p.id,p.certificate_id,u.name as personName from ship_person p LEFT JOIN sys_user u on p.person_id = u.id LEFT JOIN sys_dept d on u.dept_id = d.id -- LEFT JOIN ship_info_ship s on p.ship_id = s.id where p.delete_flag = 1
and d.simple_name like CONCAT('%',#{deptId},'%')

select p.*,u.name as personName,u.birthday,u.sex,u.email,u.phone,u.position_id as positionId,u.dept_id as deptId,s.name as lawShipName, d.full_name as deptName from ship_person p LEFT JOIN sys_user u on p.person_id = u.id LEFT JOIN sys_dept d on d.id = u.dept_id LEFT JOIN ship_info_ship s on p.ship_id = s.id where p.delete_flag = 1
and p.id=#{id}
